name: Vertigo Super Speedy Cars Race
description:
Vertigo Speedy cars Racing is a fun game with lot’s speed cars collections to race on different vertigo worlds. Jungle vertigo World with ever green look to relax your eyes. Race with amazing speedy sports cars in dreamy jungle world. There is a another snow world where snow is falling to make your speedy cars race more fun.
HIGH SPEED DRIVING
Race at high speeds, drive against traffic and And Vertigo World!
Nothing is forbidden in Racing Fever, More Danger Can Get You More Coins!
HIGH QUALITY GRAPHICS
Enjoy the cutting edge 3D graphics with realistically created environments and amazingly detailed cars.
THE CAR OF YOUR DREAMS
Amazing cars, With Awesome Speeds to Race.
How to Play Vertigo Speedy Cars Racing?
Select your Awesome Speedy cars then select your vertigo world to race on. You need to maintain your high speed to reach your next destination to pickup time, then continue your vertigo racing until you reach your destination. Try to don’t fall down to Complete your mission. Also try to avoid collision with tress or stones to save your cars from damage.
FEATURES OF VERTIGO SPEED RACING CARS.
• Amazing Cars to Choose from
• Awesome Graphics
• Awesome Vertigo Worlds
• Speed Cars
• Free To Play.
